name: Boxlo O' Man Jumping on the mountain!
name_original: Boxlo O' Man Jumping on the mountain!
description:
TOTALLY NOT AN APRIL FOOLS GAME...

Boxlo O' Man loves sunsets so one day he jumped and jumped to the biggest mountain near him. He couldn't stop jumping. Help Boxlo O' Man getting there!

Be careful! Gravity changes everytime you get higher!

Controls:

Left and Right: Movement.

X: Jump.
